parameters: What the hell is this place...
Has this been under the castle all of this
I mean the castle is centuries old right?
Surely it's not that uncommon for newer things
to be built on old ruins.
I guess, but this seems like a whole other
place altogether. The stench of death is...

What are you doing here? Aren't you supposed to
be with Morghanna in the tower?
My master sends my aspect wherever it may be
And how are you needed here?
As my master said before, she has many eyes
I see - are you here to help?
For a price, yes. Come see me if you wish to
Merely a servant... my master resides in a
Ahhh yes I remember passing it on the way
Next time you're passing through, feel free to
stop by...for now, she has empowered me to
furnish you with aid...for a price...
I'll check with you if I need anything.
